Package ca.griis.ontorelquery.exception

Class UserFriendlyException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
ca.griis.ontorelquery.exception.OntoRelQueryException
ca.griis.ontorelquery.exception.UserFriendlyException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UserFriendlyException extends OntoRelQueryException
Exception class for user-friendly error messages.

This exception is used to provide clear, actionable error messages to the user. It includes a user-friendly message, a suggestion for resolving the issue, and optionally a technical details message for developers.

See Also:
